VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Golden Spoon relative to Stellar Bistro?
SRP.A: The Golden Spoon is {above} Stellar Bistro in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Rusty Kettle}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sky High Cafe}.

VE.Q: What is Crimson Plate's Food Safety Index in 1968?
VE.A: Crimson Plate's food safety index in 1968 is {106.16} index.

VE.Q: What is Stellar Bistro's Food Safety Index in 1975?
VE.A: Stellar Bistro's food safety index in 1975 is {67.81} index.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Food Safety Index in 1977?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index in 1977 is {263.34} index.

VE.Q: What are the food safety index of The Golden Spoon, Emerald Diner, and The Rusty Kettle in 1980?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index is {348.81} index, Emerald Diner's food safety index is {21.79} index, The Rusty Kettle's food safety index is {349.49} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Food Safety Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum food safety index is {0.92} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Food Safety Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum food safety index is {906.49} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Food Safety Index level recorded for Crimson Plate?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate reached approximately {113.49} index in {1977}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Food Safety Index level recorded for Crimson Plate?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate's lowest recorded level is approximately {69.91} index in {1975}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Food Safety Index?
SC.A: The average total food safety index is {975.38} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Food Safety Index fall between 842.81 and 931.53 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Safety Index in 1970 higher or lower than in 1971?
NC.A: The total food safety index in 1970 was {lower} than in 1971.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Safety Index in 1971 higher or lower than in 1980?
NC.A: The total food safety index in 1971 was {lower} than in 1980.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Safety Index in 1966 higher or lower than in 1989?
NC.A: The total food safety index in 1966 was {lower} than in 1989.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1978, was the average total Food Safety Index higher or lower than between 1982 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total food safety index between 1974 and 1978 was {lower} than between 1982 and 1987.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {The Rusty Kettle} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Sky High Cafe, The Cozy Nook, Emerald Diner, Stellar Bistro, Crimson Plate, The Rusty Kettle, The Golden Spoon}.
